resources.string: Please provide your Storm Chat log in credentials. Email address must be from the "@stjohns.edu" domain.
Use your St. John\'s University email to create an account. A verification email will be sent to the specified address. Once verified, you will be able to sign in using your new credentials.
You must use a St. John\'s University email.
Password is not strong enough: Must contain a minimum of 6 characters and at least one instance of a digit.
Failed to create account. Are you connected to the internet? Account may already exist.
Failed to log in. Are you connected to the internet? Credentials may not have been correct.
Email address not verified. Verify email and try to log in again.
